kind.comment: Only change vendor property, do not change value property

ivrs.comment: Only change vendor property, do not change value property

mi32.comment: MacOnly, Change Vendor, set value to your plugin's entry point name, or pass name in API

wx86.comment: WinOnly, Change Vendor, set value to your plugin's entry point name, or pass name in API

pinm.comment: Change Vendor, change Sample Plugin to your plugin name, or pass name in API
